TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Uri extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 提供統一資源識別元 (URI) 的物件表示，以及對 URI 各部分的簡易存取。

span.span: Provides an object representation of a uniform resource identifier (URI) and easy access to the parts of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 是資源的以精簡方式的內部網路或網際網路上的應用程式可以使用。A URI is a compact representation of a resource available to your application on the intranet or Internet. 類別定義的屬性和方法來處理包括剖析、 比較和結合的 Uri。The class defines the properties and methods for handling URIs, including parsing, comparing, and combining. 類別屬性是唯讀; 若要建立可修改的物件，使用類別。The class properties are read-only; to create a modifiable object, use the class. 相對 Uri (例如，"/ new/index.htm")，使其絕對必須展開相對於基底 URI。Relative URIs (for example, "/new/index.htm") must be expanded with respect to a base URI so that they are absolute. 方法提供來相對 Uri，在必要時轉換成絕對 Uri。The method is provided to convert absolute URIs to relative URIs when necessary. 建構函式不逸出 URI 字串的字串是否格式正確的 URI，包括配置識別項。The constructors do not escape URI strings if the string is a well-formed URI including a scheme identifier. 屬性傳回的標準資料表示法中逸出的編碼，所有字元都使用 Unicode 值大於 127 取代成其十六進位對等用法。The properties return a canonical data representation in escaped encoding, with all characters with Unicode values greater than 127 replaced with their hexadecimal equivalents. 若要以標準形式，放入 URI建構函式會執行下列步驟：To put the URI in canonical form, the constructor performs the following steps: - 轉換為小寫的 URI 配置。Converts the URI scheme to lowercase. - 將主機名稱轉換成小寫。Converts the host name to lowercase. - 如果主機名稱是 IPv6 位址，則會使用標準的 IPv6 位址。If the host name is an IPv6 address, the canonical IPv6 address is used. ScopeId 和其他選擇性 IPv6 資料都會移除。ScopeId and other optional IPv6 data are removed. - 移除預設值和空白的連接埠號碼。Removes default and empty port numbers. - 逸出的字元 （也稱為百分比編碼八位元組） 不需要保留的目的解碼 （也稱為正在未逸出方式）。Escaped characters (also known as percent-encoded octets) that don't have a reserved purpose are decoded (also known as being unescaped). 這些非保留的字元包括大寫和小寫字母 (%41-%5a 和 %61-%7a)、 小數位數 （%30-%39)、 連字號 (%2d)、 句號 (%2e) (%5f) 底線加上波狀符號 (%7e)。These unreserved characters include uppercase and lowercase letters (%41-%5A and %61-%7A), decimal digits (%30-%39), hyphen (%2D), period (%2E), underscore (%5F), and tilde (%7E). - Canonicalizes 路徑的階層式 Uri 以壓縮序列例如 /。，/.../，，/ / （不論是否序列逸出）。Canonicalizes the path for hierarchical URIs by compacting sequences such as /./, /../, and // (whether or not the sequence is escaped). 請注意，某些配置中，這些序列則不會壓縮。Note that there are some schemes for which these sequences are not compacted. - 階層式的 uri，如果主機不終止以正斜線 （/），會新增一個。For hierarchical URIs, if the host is not terminated with a forward slash (/), one is added. - 根據預設，在 URI 中的任何保留的字元會根據 RFC 2396 逸出。By default, any reserved characters in the URI are escaped in accordance with RFC 2396. 此行為變更如果啟用國際資源識別項或國際網域名稱解析在 URI 中的大小寫保留字元會逸出根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987。This behavior changes if International Resource Identifiers or International Domain Name parsing is enabled in which case reserved characters in the URI are escaped in accordance with RFC 3986 and RFC 3987. 標準化，在某些配置、 點區段和空的區段的建構函式的一部分 (/。，/.../，，/ /) 壓縮的 （也就是說，它們已移除）。As part of canonicalization in the constructor for some schemes, dot-segments and empty segments (/./, /../, and //) are compacted (in other words, they are removed). 配置的 URI 會壓縮這些順序包括 http、 https、 tcp、 net.pipe 和 net.tcp。The schemes for which URI will compact these sequences include http, https, tcp, net.pipe, and net.tcp. 對於其他配置，這些序列則不會壓縮。For some other schemes, these sequences are not compacted. 以下是此壓縮的外觀中練習。Here's how this compacting looks in practice. ``` var uri = new Uri("http://myUrl/../.."); // http scheme, unescaped OR var uri = new Uri("http://myUrl/%2E%2E/%2E%2E"); // http scheme, escaped OR var uri = new Uri("ftp://myUrl/../.."); // ftp scheme, unescaped OR var uri = new Uri("ftp://myUrl/%2E%2E/%2E%2E"); // ftp scheme, escaped Console.WriteLine(uri.AbsoluteUri); Console.WriteLine(uri.PathAndQuery); ``` 執行此程式碼時，它會傳回下列輸出中，與未逸出方式如有必要，再壓縮的逸出序列。When this code is executed, it returns the following output, with the escaped sequences unescaped if necessary and then compacted. ``` http://myUrl/ / ``` 您可以將轉換的內容類別從 可讀取的 URI 參考使用的編碼的逸出 URI 參考方法。You can transform the contents of the class from an escape encoded URI reference to a readable URI reference by using the method. 請注意，某些保留的字元可能仍在輸出中逸出方法。Note that some reserved characters might still be escaped in the output of the method. 這是為了支援的 URI，以從傳回的值模稜兩可重建。This is to support unambiguous reconstruction of a URI from the value returned by . 一些 Uri 包含片段識別項、 查詢或兩者。Some URIs include a fragment identifier or a query or both. 片段識別項是任何文字後面的數字符號 （#），不包括數字的符號;片段文字儲存在屬性。A fragment identifier is any text that follows a number sign (#), not including the number sign; the fragment text is stored in the property. 查詢資訊就會遵循問號 （？） URI; 中的任何文字查詢文字會儲存在屬性。Query information is any text that follows a question mark (?) in the URI; the query text is stored in the property. 在.NET Framework 1.1 中，如果建構函式所指定的字串包含未知的配置和"c:\\"，Uri 類別插入"/ /"冒號後面。In the .NET Framework version 1.1, if the string specified to a constructor contains an unknown scheme and "c:\\", the Uri class inserts "//" after the colon. 例如，URI`xyz:c:\abc`轉換成`xyz://c:/abc`。For example, the URI `xyz:c:\abc` is converted to `xyz://c:/abc`. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已移除這種行為，而字串範例會轉換成`xyz:c:/abc`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this behavior has been removed, and the example string is converted to `xyz:c:/abc`. > [!NOTE] > URI 類別支援使用的 IP 位址在 IPv4 通訊協定的兩個四標記法和冒號-十六進位 IPv6 通訊協定。The URI class supports the use of IP addresses in both quad-notation for IPv4 protocol and colon-hexadecimal for IPv6 protocol. 請記得在方括號，如同 http://[::1 括住 IPv6 位址]。Remember to enclose the IPv6 address in square brackets, as in http://[::1]. ## 國際資源識別項的支援International Resource Identifier Support 網址通常會使用非常有限的一組字元所組成的統一資源識別元來表示：Web addresses are typically expressed using uniform resource identifiers that consist of a very restricted set of characters: - 大寫和小寫的英文 ASCII 字母。Upper and lower case ASCII letters from the English alphabet. - 0 到 9 位數。Digits from 0 to 9. - 少數幾個其他 ASCII 符號。A small number of other ASCII symbols. Uri 的規格記載於 RFC 2396、 RFC 2732、 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 發佈根據網際網路工程任務推動小組 (IETF)。The specifications for URIs are documented in RFC 2396, RFC 2732, RFC 3986, and RFC 3987 published by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). 隨著網際網路的成長，識別使用非英文語言資源的需求也持續成長。With the growth of the Internet, there is a growing need to identify resources using languages other than English. 有利此需求且允許非 ASCII 字元 (Unicode/ISO 10646 字元集中的字元) 的識別碼，稱為國際資源識別碼 (IRI)。Identifiers which facilitate this need and allow non-ASCII characters (characters in the Unicode/ISO 10646 character set) are known as International Resource Identifiers (IRIs). IETF 發行的 RFC 3987 中有記載 IRI 的規格。The specifications for IRIs are documented in RFC 3987 published by IETF. 使用 IRI 可讓 URL 包含 Unicode 字元。Using IRIs allows a URL to contain Unicode characters. 現有類別已經過擴充，在.NET Framework v3.5、 3.0 SP1、 2.0 SP1 提供 IRI 支援根據和 RFC 3987。The existing class has been extended in .NET Framework v3.5, 3.0 SP1, and 2.0 SP1 to provide IRI support based on RFC 3987. .NET framework 4.5 版之前的使用者不會看到從.NET Framework 2.0 行為的任何變更，除非它們特別啟用 IRI。Users of .NET Framework versions before version 4.5 will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI. 這可確保應用程式與舊版 .NET framework 相容。This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework. 若要啟用 IRI 的支援，下列變更是必要的：To enable support for IRI, the following change is required: - 指定是否要國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析套用至網域名稱，以及是否應該套用 IRI 剖析規則。Specify whether you want Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing applied to the domain name and whether IRI parsing rules should be applied. 這可以在中完成*machine.config*或*app.config*檔案。This can be done in the *machine.config* or in the *app.config* file. 例如，加入下列：For example, add the following: ```xml ``` 使用者的.NET Framework 4.5 及更新版本一律具有 IRI 啟用。Users of .NET Framework 4.5 and newer always have IRI enabled. IRI 剖析無法變更使用 *.config*檔案。IRI parsing cannot be changed using a *.config* file. 啟用 IDN 會將網域名稱中所有的 Unicode 標籤轉換成對等的 Punycode。Enabling IDN will convert all Unicode labels in a domain name to their Punycode equivalents. Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix. 這是為了支援網際網路上現有的 DNS 伺服器，因為大部分的 DNS 伺服器僅支援 ASCII 字元 (請參閱 RFC 3940)。The reason for this is to support existing DNS servers on the Internet, since most DNS servers only support ASCII characters (see RFC 3940). 啟用 IRI 和 IDN 會影響 屬性的值。Enabling IRI and IDN affects the value of the property. 啟用 IRI 和 IDN 也可以變更 、、 和 方法的行為。Enabling IRI and IDN can also change the behavior of the , , , and methods. 有三個可能的值為 IDN 根據所使用的 DNS 伺服器：There are three possible values for IDN depending on the DNS servers that are used: - 啟用 idn = Allidn enabled = All 這個值會將任何 Unicode 網域名稱轉換成 Punycode 的對等名稱 (IDN 名稱)。This value will convert any Unicode domain names to their Punycode equivalents (IDN names). - 啟用 idn = AllExceptIntranetidn enabled = AllExceptIntranet 此值將轉換為不在近端內部網路使用 Punycode 對等項目 （IDN 名稱） 上的所有 Unicode 網域名稱。This value will convert all Unicode domain names not on the local Intranet to use the Punycode equivalents (IDN names). 在此情況下，若要處理國際性近端內部網路上的名稱，用於內部網路的 DNS 伺服器應該支援 Unicode 名稱解析。In this case to handle international names on the local Intranet, the DNS servers that are used for the Intranet should support Unicode name resolution. - 啟用 idn = 無idn enabled = None 這個值不會轉換任何 Unicode 網域名稱即可使用 Punycode。This value will not convert any Unicode domain names to use Punycode. 這是預設值是與.NET Framework 2.0 的行為一致。This is the default value which is consistent with the .NET Framework 2.0 behaviour. 當啟用 IRI 剖析 (啟用 iriParsing = `true`) 根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 中的最新 IRI 規則進行正規化和字元檢查。When IRI parsing is enabled (iriParsing enabled = `true`) normalization and character checking are done according to the latest IRI rules in RFC 3986 and RFC 3987. 停用 IRI 剖析時，正規化和字元檢查都是根據 RFC 2396 和 RFC 2732 （適用於 IPv6 常值）。When IRI parsing is disabled, normalization and character checking are performed according to RFC 2396 and RFC 2732 (for IPv6 literals). 在.NET Framework 4.5 版之前的版本中，預設值是`false`。In versions of the .NET Framework before version 4.5, the default value is `false`. 在.NET Framework 4.5 版及更新版本中，預設值是`true`，而且無法修改 IRI 剖析的啟用的狀態中的設定所 *.config*檔案。In .NET Framework version 4.5 and newer, the default value is `true`, and the enabled state of IRI parsing cannot be modified by settings in a *.config* file. IRI 和處理中的 IDN類別可以也使用來控制， ，和組態設定的類別。IRI and IDN processing in the class can also be controlled using the , , and configuration setting classes. 設定可啟用或停用 類別中的 IRI 處理。The setting enables or disables IRI processing in the class. 設定可啟用或停用 類別中的 IDN 處理。The setting enables or disables IDN processing in the class. 設定也可以間接控制 IDN。The setting also indirectly controls IDN. 必須啟用 IRI 處理才能進行 IDN 處理。IRI processing must be enabled for IDN processing to be possible. 如果停用 IRI 處理，則 IDN 處理會設定為預設設定，此種情況下，.NET Framework 2.0 行為會用於相容性，但不使用 IDN 名稱。If IRI processing is disabled, then IDN processing will be set to the default setting where the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior is used for compatibility and IDN names are not used. 組態設定和會讀取一次當第一個類別建構。The configuration setting for the and will be read once when the first class is constructed. 該時間之後的組態設定變更會被忽略。Changes to configuration settings after that time are ignored. 類別也已經擴充，允許建立可自訂的剖析器，支援 IRI 和 IDN。The class has also been extended to allow creating a customizable parser that supports IRI and IDN. 指定 物件行為的方法，是將 列舉中的可用值位元組合傳遞至 建構函式。The behavior of a object is specified by passing a bitwise combination of the values available in the enumeration to the constructor. 類型，指出支援 RFC 3987 指定的國際資源識別碼 (IRI) 剖析規則的剖析器。The type indicates the parser supports the parsing rules specified in RFC 3987 for International Resource Identifiers (IRI). 是否使用 IRI 取決於先前討論過的組態值。Whether IRI is used is dictated by the configuration values previously discussed. 類型，指出剖析器支援主機名稱的國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析。The type indicates the parser supports Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing (IDN) of host names. 是否使用 IDN 的取決於先前討論過的組態值。Whether IDN is used is dictated by the configuration values previously discussed. ## 效能考量Performance Considerations 如果您使用 *Web.config * 檔案，其中包含 Uri，初始化您的應用程式，其他時間，才能處理 Uri，如果其配置識別碼並非標準用法。If you use a *Web.config *file that contains URIs to initialize your application, additional time is required to process the URIs if their scheme identifiers are nonstandard. 在這種情況下，初始化應用程式的受影響的部分 Uri 會在需要時，不是在開始時間。In such a case, initialize the affected parts of your application when the URIs are needed, not at start time. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的執行個體類別，並使用它來建立執行個體。The following example creates an instance of the class and uses it to create a instance. [!code-cpp[Classic Uri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Uri Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Uri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Uri Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Uri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Uri Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 基於安全性考量，您的應用程式時應謹慎小心接受從不受信任來源與執行個體設。您可以藉由呼叫來檢查有效性的 URI 字串方法。
Because of security concerns, your application should use caution when accepting instances from untrusted sources and with set to .You can check a URI string for validity by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立從 URI 字串的執行個體。This constructor creates a instance from a URI string. 它會剖析 URI、 將它放在標準格式，並可讓任何必要的逸出的編碼方式。It parses the URI, puts it in canonical format, and makes any required escape encodings. 這個建構函式不會保證，指的是可存取的資源。This constructor does not ensure that the refers to an accessible resource. 這個建構函式假設`string`參數參考的絕對 URI，而且相當於呼叫具有建構函式設。This constructor assumes that the `string` parameter references an absolute URI and is equivalent to calling the constructor with set to . 如果`string`參數傳遞至建構函式是相對 URI，這個建構函式將會擲回。If the `string` parameter passed to the constructor is a relative URI, this constructor will throw a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體的 uri"http://www.contoso.com/"。The following example creates a instance with the URI "http://www.contoso.com/". [!code-cpp[Classic Uri.Uri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Uri.Uri Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Uri.Uri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Uri.Uri Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Uri.Uri Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Uri.Uri Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI, with explicit control of character escaping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立從 URI 字串的執行個體。This constructor creates a instance from a URI string. 它會剖析 URI，並將它放在標準格式。It parses the URI and puts it in canonical format. `dontEscape`參數會控制是否保留的字元會轉譯成逸出序列。The `dontEscape` parameter controls whether reserved characters are translated into escape sequences. 此參數應設為`true`僅如果您確定所有保留的字元，在 URI 中已被逸出。This parameter should be set to `true` only if you are certain that all reserved characters in the URI have been escaped. 將值設定為`true`針對具有未已完全逸出 URI 可能會導致非預期的行為。Setting the value to `true` for a URI that has not been completely escaped can cause unexpected behavior. 強烈建議您一律將這個參數設定為`false`。It is strongly recommended that you always set this parameter to `false`. 如果`dontEscape`設`false`，藉由檢查有效的逸出序列所遵循的百分比 （%） 的所有項目建構函式逸出的任何保留的字元。If `dontEscape` is set to `false`, the constructor escapes any reserved characters by checking that all occurrences of percent (%) are followed by a valid escape sequence. 如果下列百分比表示的字元序列不是有效的 %取代 %25。If the character sequence following a percent is not valid, the percent is replaced by %25. 這個建構函式不會保證，指的是可存取的資源。This constructor does not ensure that the refers to an accessible resource. ## Examples 下列範例會建立uri 執行個體http://www.contoso.com/Hello%20World.htm。The following example creates a instance for the URI http://www.contoso.com/Hello%20World.htm. 包含的 URI 完全逸出，並採用標準格式，因為`dontEscape`參數可以設定為`true`。Because the contained URI is completely escaped and is in canonical form, the `dontEscape` parameter can be set to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 相對與絕對 Uri 的格式有不同的限制。Relative and absolute URIs have different restrictions on their format. 例如，相對 URI 不需要配置或授權。For example, a relative URI does not require a scheme or an authority. 在您指定的值`uriKind`必須符合 URI 中傳遞的型別`uriString`。The value you specify in `uriKind` must match the type of URI passed in `uriString`. 不過，如果指定 URI 字串可以是相對或絕對。However, if is specified, the URI string can be relative or absolute.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified base URI and relative URI string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立結合的執行個體`baseUri`和`relativeUri`。This constructor creates a instance by combining the `baseUri` and the `relativeUri`. 如果`relativeUri`是絕對 URI （包含配置、 主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼），建立執行個體只使用`relativeUri`。If `relativeUri` is an absolute URI (containing a scheme, host name, and optionally a port number), the instance is created using only `relativeUri`. 如果`baseUri`有相對的部分 (像`/api`)，則必須以斜線，結束相對的組件 (類似`/api/`)，如果相對一部分`baseUri`即將成為保留在建構。If the `baseUri` has relative parts (like `/api`), then the relative part must be terminated with a slash, (like `/api/`), if the relative part of `baseUri` is to be preserved in the constructed . 此外，如果`relativeUri`開頭斜線，則它會取代的任何相對部分 `baseUri`Additionally, if the `relativeUri` begins with a slash, then it will replace any relative part of the `baseUri` 這個建構函式不會保證，指的是可存取的資源。This constructor does not ensure that the refers to an accessible resource. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的新執行個體類別藉由結合的相對 Urihttp://www.contoso.com和形成的絕對 URI catalog/shownew.htm http://www.contoso.com/catalog/shownew.htm。The following example creates a new instance of the class by combining the relative URIs http://www.contoso.com and catalog/shownew.htm to form the absolute URI http://www.contoso.com/catalog/shownew.htm. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新結合絕對的執行個體執行個體， `baseUri`，與相對執行個體， `relativeUri`。This constructor creates a new instance by combining an absolute instance, `baseUri`, with a relative instance, `relativeUri`. 如果`relativeUri`為 absolute （包含配置、 主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼） 的執行個體，建立執行個體只使用`relativeUri`。If `relativeUri` is an absolute instance (containing a scheme, host name, and optionally a port number), the instance is created using only `relativeUri`. 如果`baseUri`有相對的部分 (像`/api`)，則必須以斜線，結束相對的組件 (類似`/api/`)，如果相對一部分`baseUri`即將成為保留在建構。If the `baseUri` has relative parts (like `/api`), then the relative part must be terminated with a slash, (like `/api/`), if the relative part of `baseUri` is to be preserved in the constructed . 此外，如果`relativeUri`開頭斜線，則它會取代的任何相對部分 `baseUri`Additionally, if the `relativeUri` begins with a slash, then it will replace any relative part of the `baseUri` 這個建構函式不會保證，指的是可存取的資源。This constructor does not ensure that the refers to an accessible resource. ## Examples 這個範例會建立絕對執行個體， `absoluteUri`，而是相對執行個體， `relativeUri`。This example creates an absolute instance, `absoluteUri`, and a relative instance, `relativeUri`. 新執行個體， `combinedUri`，接著會建立從這兩個執行個體。A new instance, `combinedUri`, is then created from these two instances. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立結合的執行個體`baseUri`和`relativeUri`。This constructor creates a instance by combining `baseUri` and `relativeUri`. 如果 URI 傳入`relativeUri`是絕對 URI （包含配置、 主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼），建立執行個體只使用`relativeUri`。If the URI passed in `relativeUri` is an absolute URI (containing a scheme, host name, and optionally a port number), the instance is created using only `relativeUri`. `dontEscape`參數會控制是否保留的字元會轉譯成逸出序列。The `dontEscape` parameter controls whether reserved characters are translated into escape sequences. 此參數應設為`true`僅如果您確定所有保留的字元，在 URI 中已被逸出。This parameter should be set to `true` only if you are certain that all reserved characters in the URI have been escaped. 將值設定為`true`針對具有未已完全逸出 URI 可能會導致非預期的行為。Setting the value to `true` for a URI that has not been completely escaped can cause unexpected behavior. 強烈建議您一律將這個參數設定為`false`。It is strongly recommended that you always set this parameter to `false`. 如果`dontEscape`設`false`，藉由檢查有效的逸出序列所遵循的百分比 （%） 的所有項目建構函式逸出的任何保留的字元。If `dontEscape` is set to `false`, the constructor escapes any reserved characters by checking that all occurrences of percent (%) are followed by a valid escape sequence. 如果下列百分比表示的字元序列不是有效的 %取代 %25。If the character sequence following a percent is not valid, the percent is replaced by %25. 這個建構函式不會保證，指的是可存取的資源。This constructor does not ensure that the refers to an accessible resource. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的新執行個體類別藉由結合的相對 Urihttp://www.contoso.com和 Hello%20World.htm 形成絕對 URI。The following example creates a new instance of the class by combining the relative URIs http://www.contoso.com and Hello%20World.htm to form an absolute URI. remarks.format:
## Remarks 移除括號 ([]) 的 IPv6 位址和設定屬性，如果有指定建構這個執行個體時。For IPv6 addresses, the brackets ([]) are removed and the property is set, if one was specified when this instance was constructed. 如果您使用的逸出的字串來建構這個執行個體 （例如，"http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%254]/temp/example.htm")，然後 DnsSafeHost 傳回逸出的字串。If you used an escaped string to construct this instance (for example, "http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%254]/temp/example.htm"), then DnsSafeHost returns an escaped string. Unescape 傳回任何逸出的字串`DnsSafeHost`之前進行 DNS 解析中使用該字串 （請參閱範例）。Unescape any escaped string returned from `DnsSafeHost` before using that string for DNS resolution (see the Example). 如果您使用了無效的逸出的字串來建構這個執行個體 （例如，"http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%4]/temp/example.htm")，然後 DnsSafeHost 傳回未逸出的字串。If you used an invalid unescaped string to construct this instance (for example, "http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%4]/temp/example.htm"), then DnsSafeHost returns an unescaped string. 屬性的相依於組態設定，如本主題稍後所述。The property is dependent on configuration settings, as discussed later in this topic. 組態設定無法變更由 Windows 市集應用程式時可能會導致不一致的結果使用。Configuration settings cannot be changed by Windows Store applications, which can lead to inconsistent results when using . 屬性依現狀使用慣用的替代方式，因為保證永遠是安全的無論何種目前 DNS *app.config*設定可能。The property is provided as the preferred alternative to using , because is guaranteed to always be DNS safe, no matter what the current *app.config* settings might be. 屬性已在.NET Framework v3.5、 3.0 SP1、 擴充和 2.0 SP1 提供國際資源識別項 (IRI) 支援根據的 RFC 3987。The property has been extended in .NET Framework v3.5, 3.0 SP1, and 2.0 SP1 to provide International Resource Identifier (IRI) support based on RFC 3987. 目前的使用者除非特別啟用 IRI，否則看不出與 .NET Framework 2.0 的行為有任何不同之處。Current users will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI. 這可確保應用程式與舊版 .NET framework 相容。This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework. 若要啟用 IRI 的支援，下列兩項變更是必要的：To enable support for IRI, the following two changes are required: 1. 將下列行加入*machine.config* .NET Framework 2.0 目錄下的檔案Add the following line to the *machine.config* file under the .NET Framework 2.0 directory \<區段名稱 ="uri"type="System.Configuration.UriSection，系統中，版本 = 2.0.0.0，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = b77a5c561934e089"/ >\
2. 指定是否要國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析套用至網域名稱，以及是否應該套用 IRI 剖析規則。Specify whether you want Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing applied to the domain name and whether IRI parsing rules should be applied. 這可以在中完成*machine.config*或*app.config*檔案。This can be done in the *machine.config* or in the *app.config* file. 例如，加入下列：For example, add the following: ```xml ``` 啟用 IDN 會將網域名稱中所有的 Unicode 標籤轉換成對等的 Punycode。Enabling IDN will convert all Unicode labels in a domain name to their Punycode equivalents. Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix. 這是為了支援網際網路上現有的 DNS 伺服器，因為大部分的 DNS 伺服器僅支援 ASCII 字元 (請參閱 RFC 3940)。The reason for this is to support existing DNS servers on the Internet, since most DNS servers only support ASCII characters (see RFC 3940). 啟用 IDN 只會影響值屬性。Enabling IDN only affects the value of the property. 有三個可能的值為 IDN 根據所使用的 DNS 伺服器：There are three possible values for IDN depending on the DNS servers that are used: - 啟用 idn = Allidn enabled = All 這個值會將任何 Unicode 網域名稱轉換成 Punycode 的對等名稱 (IDN 名稱)。This value will convert any Unicode domain names to their Punycode equivalents (IDN names). - 啟用 idn = AllExceptIntranetidn enabled = AllExceptIntranet 這個值會將所有外部 Unicode 網域名稱轉換成使用 Punycode 的對等名稱 (IDN 名稱)。This value will convert all external Unicode domain names to use the Punycode equivalents (IDN names). 此例中，若要在近端內部網路上處理國際性名稱，則用於內部網路的 DNS 伺服器應該支援 Unicode 名稱。In this case to handle international names on the local Intranet, the DNS servers that are used for the Intranet should support Unicode names. - 啟用 idn = 無idn enabled = None 這個值不會轉換任何 Unicode 網域名稱即可使用 Punycode。This value will not convert any Unicode domain names to use Punycode. 這是預設值是與.NET Framework 2.0 的行為一致。This is the default value which is consistent with the .NET Framework 2.0 behaviour. 啟用 IRI 剖析 (啟用 iriParsing = `true`) 將會執行正規化和 RFC 3987 字元檢查最新 IRI 根據規則。Enabling IRI parsing (iriParsing enabled = `true`) will do normalization and character checking according to the latest IRI rules in RFC 3987. 預設值是`false`會執行正規化和字元檢查根據 RFC 2396 和 RFC 2732 （適用於 IPv6 常值）。The default value is `false` and will do normalization and character checking according to RFC 2396 and RFC 2732 (for IPv6 literals). 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節類別。For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the class. ## Examples 下列範例會建立從字串的執行個體。The following example creates a instance from a string. 它說明從傳回的值之間的差異傳回的主機名稱或 URI 中所指定的位址，從傳回的值，它會傳回可安全使用於 DNS 解析的位址。It illustrates the difference between the value returned from , which returns the host name or address specified in the URI, and the value returned from , which returns an address that is safe to use in DNS resolution. [!code-cpp[NCLUriEnhancements#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLUriEnhancements/CPP/nclurienhancements.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLUriEnhancements#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLUriEnhancements/CS/nclurienhancements.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLUriEnhancements#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLUriEnhancements/VB/nclurienhancements.vb#4)] < 備註 > 中所述，不要解決它之前逸出主機名稱。As explained in Remarks, unescape the host name before resolving it. 您可以使用方法來逸出主機名稱，而您就可以解決藉由呼叫方法。You can use the method to unescape the host name, and you can resolve it by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會比較兩個執行個體，而不考慮使用者資訊 () 以及片段 () 它們可能包含的組件。The method compares the two instances without regard to user information () and fragment () parts that they might contain. 例如，給定 Urihttp://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search和http://user:password@www.contoso.com/index.htm、方法會傳回`true`。For example, given the URIs http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search and http://user:password@www.contoso.com/index.htm, the method would return `true`. 如果一個執行個體的正確使用 Unicode 的主機名稱和`comparand`參數包含執行個體或主機名稱有一個具有對等的 Punycode 主機名稱，然後構成的識別項傳回`true`支援國際資源識別項 (IRI) 和國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 時，才會啟用。If one instance is formed with a Unicode host name and `comparand` parameter contains a instance or identifier that is formed with a host name that has the equivalent Punycode host name, then returns `true` only if International Resource Identifier (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) support are enabled. Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix. 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節類別。For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版，也會被忽略。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, the is also ignored. > [!NOTE] > 衍生類別中覆寫方法; 請謹慎因為惡意的實體無法修改的方法。The method can be overridden in a derived class; use caution as a malicious entity could modify the method. 您不應該使用這個方法來執行安全性檢查，除非您知道此執行個體來自受信任的來源。You should not use this method to perform security checks unless you know that this instance came from a trusted source. ## Examples 這個範例會建立兩個從字串執行個體，並比較它們，以判斷它們是否表示相同的值。This example creates two instances from strings and compares them to determine whether they represent the same value. `address1` 和`address2`不相同，因為部分會忽略此項比較。`address1` and `address2` are the same because the portion is ignored for this comparison. 結果會寫入至主控台。The outcome is written to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，方法會將 RFC 2396 非保留字元除外的所有字元都轉換成其十六進位表示法。By default, the method converts all characters except for RFC 2396 unreserved characters to their hexadecimal representation. 如果已啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，方法將所有字元，除了 RFC 3986 非保留的字元，其十六進位表示法。If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the method converts all characters, except for RFC 3986 unreserved characters, to their hexadecimal representation. 之前要逸出，所有 Unicode 字元都轉換成 utf-8 格式。All Unicode characters are converted to UTF-8 format before being escaped. 這個方法會假設`stringToEscape`中有任何逸出序列。This method assumes that `stringToEscape` has no escape sequences in it. 根據預設，此字串是根據 RFC 2396 逸出。By default, the string is escaped according to RFC 2396. 如果啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，則字串會根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 逸出。If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the string is escaped according to RFC 3986 and RFC 3987. 請參閱這些 Rfc 定義的保留和非保留字元。See these RFCs for a definition of reserved and unreserved characters. 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節類別。For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回字串，包含最左邊的部分 URI 字串中，結尾所指定的部分`part`。The method returns a string containing the leftmost portion of the URI string, ending with the portion specified by `part`. 包含分隔符號，在下列情況： includes delimiters in the following cases: - 包含配置分隔符號。 includes the scheme delimiter. - 不包含路徑分隔符號。 does not include the path delimiter. - 最多的查詢或片段的分隔符號與原始 URI 中包含任何分隔符號。 includes any delimiters in the original URI up to the query or fragment delimiter. - 包含，加上查詢以及其分隔符號。 includes the , plus the query and its delimiter. 下列範例顯示 URI 和呼叫的結果與， ， ，或。The following examples show a URI and the results of calling with , , , or . |URIURI|配置Scheme|授權單位Authority|路徑Path|查詢Query| |---------|------------|---------------|----------|-----------| |http://www.contoso.com/index.htm?date=today|http://http://|http://www.contoso.com|http://www.contoso.com/index.htm|http://www.contoso.com/index.htm?date=today| |http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main|http://http://|http://www.contoso.com|http://www.contoso.com/index.htm|http://www.contoso.com/index.htm| |mailto:user@contoso.com?subject=urimailto:user@contoso.com?subject=uri|mailto:mailto:|mailto:user@contoso.com|mailto:user@contoso.com?subject=urimailto:user@contoso.com?subject=uri|\<無 >\| |nntp://news.contoso.com/123456@contoso.com|nntp: / /nntp://|nntp://news.contoso.comnntp://news.contoso.com|nntp://news.contoso.com/123456@contoso.com|nntp://news.contoso.com/123456@contoso.com| |news:123456@contoso.com|新聞：news:|news:123456@contoso.com|news:123456@contoso.com|\<無 >\| |file://server/filename.extfile://server/filename.ext|file://file://|file://serverfile://server|file://server/filename.extfile://server/filename.ext|file://server/filename.extfile://server/filename.ext| ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並寫入主控台中的路徑。The following example creates a instance and writes the path to the console. .property instance string IdnHost
Public ReadOnly Property IdnHost As String
public: property System::String ^ IdnHost { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 主機之符合 RFC 3490 標準的國際網域名稱，並適當地使用 Punycode。

span.span: The RFC 3490 compliant International Domain Name of the host, using Punycode as appropriate.

summary.span: 這個字串在視需要取消逸出後，可放心用於 DNS 解析。

span.span: This string, after being unescaped if necessary, is safe to use for DNS resolution.

value.span: 傳回根據 IDN 標準以 Punycode 格式化的主機名稱。

span.span: Returns the hostname, formatted with Punycode according to the IDN standard..

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性被供需要 Punycode 表單中的網域名稱的較低層級網路通訊協定的使用。This property is provided for the use of lower-level networking protocols that require the domain name in Punycode form. 如果您的程式碼不需要該特定格式，使用主機名稱。If your code does not require that specific format, use for the hostname. 已被取代屬性是相依於*app.config*無法變更的 Windows 市集應用程式的設定。The deprecated property is dependent on *app.config* settings, which cannot be changed by Windows Store applications. IdnHost 依現狀使用慣用的替代方式，因為保證永遠是安全的無論何種目前 DNS *app.config*設定可能。IdnHost is provided as the preferred alternative to using , because is guaranteed to always be DNS safe, no matter what the current *app.config* settings might be. 如果您使用的逸出的字串來建構這個執行個體 （例如，"http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%254]/temp/example.htm")，然後 IdnHost 傳回逸出的字串。If you used an escaped string to construct this instance (for example, "http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%254]/temp/example.htm"), then IdnHost returns an escaped string. 您應該 unescape IdnHost 之前使用該字串的 DNS 解析傳回任何逸出的字串。You should unescape any escaped string returned from IdnHost before using that string for DNS resolution. 請注意，如果您使用了無效的逸出的字串來建構這個執行個體 （例如，"http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%4]/temp/example.htm")，然後 IdnHost 傳回未逸出的字串。Be aware that if you used an invalid unescaped string to construct this instance (for example, "http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%4]/temp/example.htm"), then IdnHost returns an unescaped string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來比較目前與指定的執行個體以判斷此 URI 是否為指定的基底。 is used to compare the current instance to a specified to determine whether this URI is a base for the specified . 當比較兩個物件來判斷基底關聯性的使用者資訊 () 則不會評估。When comparing two objects to determine a base relationship, the user information () is not evaluated. 比較兩個 Uri （uri1 與 uri2），uri1 時與 uri2 的基底如果當您忽略 uri2 中的所有項目後的最後一個斜線 （/），是相同的兩個 Uri。When comparing two URIs (uri1 and uri2), uri1 is the base of uri2 if, when you ignore everything in uri2 after the last slash (/), the two URIs are identical. 使用http://host/path/path/file?query做為基底 URI 下, 表顯示是否其他 Uri 的基底。Using http://host/path/path/file?query as the base URI, the following table shows whether it is a base for other URIs. |URIURI|http://host/path/path/file?query 是的基底http://host/path/path/file?query is base of| |---------|------------------------------------------------------| |http://host/path/path/file/|是yes| |http://host/path/path/#fragment|是yes| |http://host/path/path/MoreDir/"http://host/path/path/MoreDir/"|是yes| |http://host/path/path/OtherFile?Query|是yes| |http://host/path/path/|是yes| |http://host/path/path/file|是yes| |http://host/path/path|否no| |http://host/path/path?query|否no| |http://host/path/path#Fragment|否no| |http://host/path/path2/|否no| : //host/path/path2/MoreDir://host/path/path2/MoreDir|否no| |http://host/path/File|否no| ## Examples 這個範例會建立執行個體，表示基底執行個體。This example creates a instance that represents a base instance. 然後它會建立第二個從字串的執行個體。It then creates a second instance from a string. 它會呼叫判斷基底的執行個體是否為第二個執行個體的基底。It calls to determine whether the base instance is the base of the second instance. 結果會寫入至主控台。The outcome is written to the console. Uri `file://computer/file.ext`，絕對路徑`/file.ext`和本機路徑是`\\computer\file.ext`。For the URI `file://computer/file.ext`, the absolute path is `/file.ext` and the local path is `\\computer\file.ext`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並寫入主控台中的本機路徑。The following example creates a instance and writes the local path to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的建構函式的 URI 包含開頭或尾端空格，則會保留這些空格。If the URI specified to the constructor contained leading or trailing spaces, these spaces are preserved. 這個屬性所傳回的值不同於和。The value returned by this property differs from and . 傳回 URI 以標準方式未逸出的格式。 returns the canonically unescaped form of the URI. 傳回以標準方式逸出的格式的 URI。 returns the canonically escaped form of the URI. 支援國際資源識別項 (IRI) 和國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 啟用時，傳回 Punycode 主機名稱與原始非正規化的字串，如果其中一個用來初始化執行個體。When International Resource Identifier (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) support are enabled, returns the original non normalized string with Punycode host name if one was used to initialize the instance. Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix. 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節類別。For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the class. 當序列化物件不會保留。When a object is serialized, the is not preserved. 序列化程序會使用完全逸出和正式序列化時的屬性。The serialization process uses the fully escaped and canonicalized property when serializing. 如包含 IPv6 位址，IPv6 位址和範圍識別碼會包含在序列化物件。For a that contains an IPv6 address, the IPv6 address and the scope ID are included in the serialized object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新從字串的執行個體。The following example creates a new instance from a string. 它說明從傳回的值之間的差異，建構函式，並從呼叫傳回的字串傳遞，它會傳回的標準格式字串。It illustrates the difference between the value returned from , which returns the string that was passed to the constructor, and from a call to , which returns the canonical form of the string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回用來初始化的配置執行個體。The property returns the scheme used to initialize the instance. 這個屬性不會指出配置用來初始化已辨識的執行個體。This property does not indicate that the scheme used to initialize the instance was recognized. 下表顯示一些可能的值所傳回的範例屬性。The following table shows examples of some possible values returned by the property. |配置Scheme|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |檔案file|資源是在本機電腦上的檔案。The resource is a file on the local computer.| |ftpftp|資源是透過 FTP 存取。The resource is accessed through FTP.| |gophergopher|資源是透過 Gopher 通訊協定存取。The resource is accessed through the Gopher protocol.| |httphttp|資源是透過 HTTP 存取。The resource is accessed through HTTP.| |httpshttps|資源是透過 SSL 加密 HTTP 存取。The resource is accessed through SSL-encrypted HTTP.| |ldapldap|資源是透過 LDAP 通訊協定存取。The resource is accessed through the LDAP protocol.| |mailtomailto|資源是電子郵件地址，並透過 SMTP 通訊協定存取。The resource is an email address and accessed through the SMTP protocol.| |net.pipenet.pipe|透過具名管道存取資源。The resource is accessed through a named pipe.| |net.tcpnet.tcp|從 TCP 端點，以存取資源。The resource is accessed from TCP endpoint.| |新聞news|資源是透過 NNTP 通訊協定存取。The resource is accessed through the NNTP protocol.| |nntpnntp|資源是透過 NNTP 通訊協定存取。The resource is accessed through the NNTP protocol.| |telnettelnet|透過 TELNET 通訊協定存取資源。The resource is accessed through the TELNET protocol.| |uuiduuid|資源是透過唯一的 UUID 端點名稱與服務通訊的存取。The resource is accessed through a unique UUID endpoint name for communicating with a service.| ## Examples 下列範例會寫入的主控台中的配置名稱 (http) http://www.contoso.com/ URI。The following example writes the scheme name (http) to the console for the http://www.contoso.com/ URI. summary.span: 取得陣列，包含構成指定 URI 的路徑區段。

span.span: Gets an array containing the path segments that make up the specified URI.

value.span: 陣列，包含構成指定 URI 的路徑片段。

span.span: A array that contains the path segments that make up the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回包含的 「 區段 」 （子字串） 構成 URI 的絕對路徑的字串陣列。The property returns an array of strings containing the "segments" (substrings) that form the URI's absolute path. 第一個區段被透過剖析從其第一個字元的絕對路徑，直到您到達斜線 （/） 或在路徑結尾。The first segment is obtained by parsing the absolute path from its first character until you reach a slash (/) or the end of the path. 每個額外的區段開始先前區段後的第一個字元，並終止與一個斜線或路徑的結尾。Each additional segment begins at the first character after the preceding segment, and terminates with the next slash or the end of the path. （URI 的絕對路徑包含的所有項目之後的主機和連接埠，以及之前的查詢和片段）。(A URI's absolute path contains everything after the host and port and before the query and fragment.) 下列範例會顯示兩個 Uri 的絕對路徑和區段。The following example shows the absolute path and segments for two URIs. 第二個範例說明片段與查詢不是絕對路徑的一部分，因此不是區段。The second example illustrates that the fragment and query are not part of the absolute path and therefore are not segments. 絕對 URIAbsolute URI http://www.contoso.com/Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm 絕對路徑Absolute path /Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm/Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm 區段Segments /Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm/Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm 絕對 URIAbsolute URI http://www.contoso.com/Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm#page1?answer=NO 絕對路徑Absolute path /Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm/Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm 區段Segments /Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm/Chapters/Chapter1/Sections/Section1.htm 請注意，以 '/' 開頭的絕對路徑，因為第一個區段包含它和其他內容。Note that because the absolute path starts with a '/', the first segment contains it and nothing else. ## Examples 下列範例會建立區段 3 的執行個體，並會在螢幕上顯示的區段。The following example creates a instance with 3 segments and displays the segments on the screen. [!code-cpp[NCLUriExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLUriExamples/CPP/uriexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLUriExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLUriExamples/CS/uriexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLUriExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLUriExamples/VB/uriexamples.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`表示用來建立字串執行個體已完全逸出之前已傳遞給建構函式; 也就是說，`dontEscape`建構函式呼叫的參數已設為`true`.The property is set to `true` to indicate that the string used to create the instance was completely escaped before it was passed to the constructor; that is, the `dontEscape` parameter of the constructor call was set to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並決定是否它已完全逸出字元建立時。The following example creates a instance and determines whether it was fully escaped when it was created.
